channel.title: Megaupload
channel.description:
Hey,
Anybody others that have seen the megaupload site has been taken to the US district court.
Anybody got a meaning about it?

item.title: Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:16, topic:434910”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=537630.msg3931677#msg3931677 date=1330730756]

You know… playstation CD images and other such things go over 500MB so you usually have to download from multiple links if they use websites with limits.

Dropbox

/Problem solved

Just so you know, dropbox does give you a limit.

2gig unless you buy more. Still not too bad though.
[/quote]
just make multiple accounts and share folders to one main account.[/quote]
Omg. Your a genius. I’m going to set it up like that right now

Read full topic

item.title: Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage Owner Zack of PwnageScape
item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:434910”][quote author=Owner Zack of PwnageScape link=topic=537630.msg3931597#msg3931597 date=1330727271]

Oh my god, my brain cells! Just kidding, but honestly, they believe the person who made the original post deserves a death penalty.

Also, I would really suggest Mediafire or Uppit, much less waiting times.

Uppit is by far the best, but limits you to 500MB at a time.
Uploadee is good too.

I don’t think most people need to upload 500MB at once :D.
[/quote]

You get faster to that 500mb than you think,
Just uploading an MP3- pack or something get’s you easily at it[/quote]
Oh, okay. I was talking mainly about RSPS.

Read full topic
